title: Cyberlink DVD Suite v5.0 Pro Vista
description:
CyberLink DVD Suite v5.0 Pro Vista Edition *MULTiLANGUAGE*
                            (c) CyberLink Corp.

   The     Ultimate     DVD     Playback     and     Creativity    Software

    Create & enjoy DVDs with 10 essential applications
    Automatically fix and edit videos, animate photos
    Play DVD movies, video and music files
    Burn data files, rip music CDs and designs labels
    Archive application data, files, and folders

   The Complete Suite of DVD Applications:
   ---------------------------------------
    Edit HD videos with PowerDirector 5 (SEP version)
    Watch DVDs and videos with PowerDVD 7 (Express)
    Author DVDs with PowerProducer 4 (DVD version)
    Archive files with PowerBackup 2.5
    Create photo slideshows with MediaShow 3
    Make music discs and burn data with Power2Go 5.5
    Duplicate DVDs with PowerDVD Copy
    Burn directly to disc with InstantBurn 5
    Design disc labels with LabelPrint 2
    Access all applications from one location with PowerStarter 5

   The all-media solution: DVDs, videos, photos, music, and data:
   --------------------------------------------------------------
    Videos & Photos - capture, edit, output
    Movie playback - watch, listen, navigate
    Data - burn, copy, archive and restore
    Music - rip, convert, and compile
    Disc Utilities - design, append, duplicate

   One central interface: PowerStarter:
   ------------------------------------
    Access tasks under easy-to-follow categories
    Launch a product via one screen
    Add often-used tasks to the favorites category for faster access

*************
Requirements

   Microsoft Windows 2000/XP/Vista
    256 MB RAM recommended
    Intel Pentium 4 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon 2500+ is recommended
    Hard Disk: 1 GB (3 GB recommended) for VCD/SVCD/MiniDVD
                10 GB (15 GB recommended) for DVD
    1024 X 768 pixels, 16-bit color
    DV Tape to MPEG-2 (real-time) and Right to Disc Recording: 512 MB RAM
    CD/DVD Burning Device: A BD-RE burner is required to burn Blu-ray Discs
     A DVD burner is required to burn DVD/MiniDVD titles
     A CD burner (CD-R/RW) is required to burn CD/VCD titles
    A microphone is required for recording voice-overs
    Video Capturing Device: Digital camera photos import: USB interface
     Digital Still Camera photo import: USB interface
     Analog video capture: USB or PCI capture devices
     DV camcorder video capture: IEEE 1394 I/O devices
     DV Camcorder video capture: IEEE 1394 I/O devices

********************
ThanX to CYGiSO Crew
